### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Factory at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0) 

### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Another Iron Plate Factory at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource before attempting to harvest
### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- Make sure you have the required item in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnace
